Noufissa Benchehida (a mụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1975) bụ onye France na-eme ihe nkiri na Morocco.
A mụrụ Benchehida na Morocco n'afọ 1975 na Oujda
Ọ zụlitere mmasị maka ihe nkiri na nwata. Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Cours Florent na Paris
Benchehida nwetara diplọma na ihe nkiri na Conservatory nke Casablanca. Ọ gakwara ụlọ akwụkwọ dị elu nke ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na njem nleta na Montpellier.
Benchehida mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya n'afọ 2004, na Syriana nke Stephane Cagan duziri. Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama na-eme ka onye uwe ojii Zineb Hejjami na usoro TV El kadia n'afọ 2006
O kwuru na ọ masịrị ya n'ọrụ ahụ mana ọ chọghị ịghọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na-eme ka ndị uwe ojii, ọ chọkwara ịpụta na ihe nkiri. N'afọ 2006, ọ nọ na usoro ihe nkiri TV nke Siria Moulouk Attawaif
N'afọ 2011, Benchehida nwere ọrụ dị mkpa dịka nwanyị na-eme mkpọsa maka ụmụ nwanyị a na-erigbu na Agadir Bombay, nke Myriam Bakir duziri. N'afọ 2015, o mere ihe nkiri Aida
N'afọ 2016, Benchehida pụtara na A la recherche du pouvoir perdu ("Na Search of Lost Power"), nke Mohammed Ahed Bensouda duziri
Ọ gosipụtara Ilham, onye na-agụ egwú cabaret nke na-eso onye ọchịagha lara ezumike nká
Ọrụ ya mere ka ọ nata Golden Sotigui na Sotigui Awards nke afọ 20 E nyekwara Benchehida ihe nrite Best Actress na Panafrican Film and Television Festival nke Ouagadougou.
Benchehida na-asụ French, Arabic, na Bekee.
